topic.title: Configurable DMN validation in IBM BAMOE

body.p: By default, the IBM BAMOE CodeGen component uses the kogito.decisions.validation=ENABLED configuration to perform pre-compilation validation of DMN model assets and to perform DMN decision table static analysis.
When this configuration is enabled, IBM BAMOE performs the following DMN validations:

ul.li: DMN model files are verified against the DMN specification XSD schema to ensure that the files are valid XML and compliant with the specification.
The pre-compilation analysis is performed for the DMN model to ensure that the basic semantic is aligned with the DMN specification.
DMN decision tables are statically analyzed for gaps or overlaps and to ensure that the semantic of the decision table follows best practices.

body.note: If you enter an unrecognized kogito.decisions.validation configuration flag, all pre-compilation validation features are disabled and the IBM BAMOE CodeGen emits related log messages.
